alert.note: Alert for Gove; Greeley; Logan; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:46AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MST /1 PM CST/ TODAY TO 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Wallace, Logan, Gove, Greeley and Wichita Counties. * WHEN...From noon MST /1 PM CST/ today to 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact holiday travel. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near blizzard to blizzard conditions are expected within the advisory area. Snow will overspread the area from the north and east. The most hazardous coverage of strong winds and falling snow may not occur until overnight Monday into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
